title: Middlekauff - 3 & Out - Russell Wilson/NY rumor, NFL Combine thoughts; XXL Middlekauff Mailbag
itunes:title: Middlekauff - 3 & Out - Russell Wilson/NY rumor, NFL Combine thoughts; XXL Middlekauff Mailbag
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.  In this episode, Middlekauff explains why Russell Wilson getting to New York is easier said than in the NFL, his thoughts heading into the NFL Combine, and answers a ton of listener questions in an extended Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com and subscribe to find the latest content.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
